import React, { useEffect } from "react"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; export default function Cart({cart, setCart, isScrolled}) { const navigate = useNavigate(); const total = cart.reduce((a, c) => { return a + (c.furniture.price * c.quantities); }, 0); return (

Order Summary

{cart.length !== 0 ?
{cart.map(item => { return (
navigate(`/furnitures/${item.furniture.id}`)}>

navigate(`/furnitures/${item.furniture.id}`)}> {item.furniture.name}

USD {item.furniture.price.toLocaleString()}

Quantity

{item.quantities}

Remove Furniture

)})}

Delivery

Excluding delivery

Total(Excel. tax)

USE {total.toLocaleString()}

:

Your cart is empty.

}
) }
